group_1.textRight: What?!
You guys DON'T eat soba on@New Year's Eve in Kirimine?!

group_1.textLeft: No, we don't; I've never partaken@in that custom.
...Is it really that surprising?

group_1.textRight: I gotta eat soba on New Year's Eve.
If I don't, the year doesn't feel like@it's over...

group_1.textLeft: Ah...I know just what you mean!
It's the very essence of the end@of the year.

group_1.textRight: It's exceptional...@It tastes better than normal.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, when you put it like that,@I'm curious...

group_1.textRight: Why not just ask someone@to make it for you?

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...@But all of the villagers are busy...

group_1.textRight: Then how about producing it yourself?

group_1.textLeft: Me? Making soba?

group_1.textRight: You can learn to do so by participating@in a soba-making workshop.
It’s fantastic when served with cooked@wild duck meat!

group_1.textLeft: Wild...?@Wouldn't that mean you have to hunt it?

group_1.textRight: No, no...
I am not aware of any workshop@that begins with procuring ducks.

group_1.textLeft: O-oh, I see...@That scared me.

group_1.textRight: Back to the topic at hand...
Not only do the workshops teach you to make 'em,@they give you a bag of buckwheat flour as a souvenir.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, a souvenir, too!
Perhaps I'll look for a workshop@I can attend.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, good plan!

group_1.textCenter: Here we are! We finished changing!

group_1.textLeft: Tadaaaa! What do you think?@It's our new haregi!

group_1.textRight: Erm...it's embarrassing to be at@the center of attention...

group_1.textLeft: There's no need to be shy;@you both look fantastic!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* Don't we?
Mom and Dad picked this out for me...!
Thank you. I had a new one@commissioned myself.

group_1.textLeft: You look very pretty. The hat suits you well!

group_1.textRight: That's a relief...
I wasn't sure if it went with the kimono,
and I kept going back and forth on@whether I should wear it or not...

group_1.textLeft: It's gorgeous when coupled@with the lace!
Hahaaa! This is gonna be a great New Year!
I'm tempted to go barging into@the head family's village...

group_1.textRight: We'd love to have you!

group_1.textLeft: ...Nah, I'll have to settle for being@thankful for your kindness.
I gotta help out at the temple,@you see.

group_1.textRight: Aw, too bad...
Speaking of which, Miss Shizuka...

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: Where's your haregi?

group_1.textLeft: I don't have one.

group_1.textRight: What...? Oh, my apologies...

group_1.textLeft: Huh?! No, there's no need to apologize!
While I don't have a haregi per se,@I do have a special outfit.

group_1.textRight: Special? [chara:305801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305801:cheek_0][chara:305801:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:305801:lipSynch_1]I'd like to see it.

group_1.textLeft: Alright, I'll have it sent from my parents'@house, so please look forward to it!
